name: amegmen
description: AMegMen (Accessible MegaMenu) is an Keyboard accessible, jQuery-free and Framework-free MegaMenu plugin which is fully responsive, and supports multiple levels.

scripts.compile:sass: node-sass --source-map true src/amegmen/sass/ -o dist/amegmen/styles && node-sass --source-map true src/amegmen-2/sass/ -o dist/amegmen-2/styles
scripts.uglify:css: uglifycss dist/amegmen/styles/amegmen.css --output dist/amegmen/styles/amegmen.min.css && uglifycss dist/amegmen-2/styles/amegmen.css --output dist/amegmen-2/styles/amegmen.min.css
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile:ts && npm run compile:sass
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:dev && npm run uglify:js && npm run uglify:css
scripts.compile:sitesass: node-sass --source-map true src/site/sass/ -o dist/site/styles && uglifycss dist/site/styles/index.css --output dist/site/styles/index.min.css

author: https://github.com/adityakahb
